name: ng2-tree-navigator
description: A NG2 component for navigating tree structures.

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: rimraf ./index.d.ts && rimraf ./index.js && rimraf ./index.js.map && rimraf ./src/**/*.d.ts && rimraf ./src/**/*.js && rimraf ./src/**/*.js.map

author: joel.binnquist@cag.se
